head.supplied: Dear Baron von Mueller ¶ ¶ The Census of Austral. Plants ¶ is, I am sorry to tell you out of print and as regards the Fragmenta we are and will be for the next six months extremely busy ¶ Faithfully...

div.p: M89/6614, unit 501, VPRS 3992/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
See M to R. Brain, 22 May 1889 (in this edition as 89-05-22b). Dear Baron von Mueller

The Census of Austral. Plants
B83.03.04. A second edition, B89.12.03, was printed by December 1889 (M to T. Wilson, 7 December 1889) and an advance copy was seen at the meeting of the Field Naturalists' Club on 9 December ( Victorian naturalist , vol. 6, p. 137). The work was probably not distrubuted, however, until early 1890.
is, I am sorry to tell you out of print and as regards the Fragmenta we are and will be for the next six months extremely busy
